body.name: Oval Bookshelf 5 Tier Industrial Bookcases, Free Standing Tall Bookshelves Storage for Books, Farmhouse Wood and Metal Display Shelves for Living Room Bedroom Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 41 mins
features: 【Flexible 5-Tier Bookshelf】This wide open bookcase has 12 shelves, providing plenty of storage space to display your books, collectibles, keepsakes, photos, artworks, plants, and more.Size:69.8"H x 49.2"W x 11.8"D

【Multifunctional Sturdy Bookcase】Functional ladder book shelf takes up limited space. Can meet your storage needs as it not only acts as a bookshelf, but also is a great plant shelf or display shelf or standing storage shelf in your living room, bedroom, study, entrance, hallway, office, etc.

【Industrial Style】Combining black pipes and oak grain shelves, this pipe industrial bookshelf gives that industrial vibe for elegant storage. Open shelves expand the sense of space, reduce the footprint, make your room look bigger, suitable for small spaces.

【Sturdy & More Secure】High-quality wood board and sturdy steel frame tubes ensure bookcases stability and durability, the adjustable feet prevent shelving from wobbling. And we also provide anti-tip safety kit to prevent bookshelf from dumping, which is friendly for children & pets.

【Easy to Assemble】Comes with a clear assembly manual and all necessary tools with numbered parts, so etagere bookcase is easy to assemble in a short time. There are also pictures and assembly instructions video on the page. When we say "easy assembly" we really mean it!

【Worry-Free Warranty】Moozerka with professional and reliable pre-sale and after-sales service, customer satisfaction is our pursuit! If you have any questions and concerns about the vintage metal and wood bookshelf, please don't hesitate to contact us, we will give a satisfactory solution within 24 hours!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Looking for a multifunctional bookshelf to hold books or display your collection? Add this rustic and industrial furniture to your home.Rustic brown wood, not just a book shelf, it can be a big decoration to your house.Provide ample display space in the office or living area with this industrial tall bookcase！

Multi USE Tall Bookcase Moozerka designed this 5 tier bookcases for home to increase the usability of spaces. With 12 open storage shelves, you can display all your books, dolls, favorite models, antiques, vases, potted plants, sculpture and keep everything in order. Your home will be refreshed. This is a multifunctional storage shelves, and you can put it in your bedroom, living room, kitchen, garage, office and etc.

Industrial Style Defined by rustic wood grain, this decorative open storage shelf brings a touch of industrial charm to your home. Reliable Construction With 0.78"×0.78" matal frames and thick engineered wood, each panel of the bookcase can hold up to 30 lbs. Adjustable Feet 4 adjustable feetpads can help the bookshelf keep stable on uneven floors and prevent floors from scratches. Anti-tipping Kit To prevent injury and property damage from unexpected tipping, please fix the bookcase to the wall with the anti-tipping kit.

reviews.reviewerName: good just need the exact time it will shut downgood just need the exact time it will shut down
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love it, was easy to assemble quality was good doesn’t look cheap for the price I paid Looks very nice . I have so many compliments on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice piece of furniture
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to assemble. We used a screw gun and small ratchet to speed up the process. All screw holes lined up. It comes with wall anchors, that I would recommend using if you have kids or cats! We have neither so did not use them. I'm not crazy about the color of the shelves, but there were no other color options. Overall, I'm very happy with this and I am always skeptical when the price is low. Its stylish, unique, and fun. The shelf spaces are all the same height. The wide angle lense distorted my photo a bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a good item, easy to put together, and work great for what we want to use for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, good materials
reviews.reviewText: This is a quality piece of furniture That really ties my Living room together. It took quite a while to assemble by myself, but was well worth the price and the effort. If I had any complaints, they would be very minor..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and a great addition
reviews.reviewText: I have had this bookcase for a long while now and it has been a great addition to my home. The shape is unique and fills up wall space very nicely. It is also very sturdy and doesn’t wobble or shake at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this book case it's a piece of art. Holds lots of things at different levels. Perfect for displaying art, pictures or Nick nacks. Sturdy and solid piece. Nice woodgrain. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Had Issues But Ended Up Happy
reviews.reviewText: The unit I received had some issues that made correct assembly not possible, but the merchant was incredibly helpful and kind and resolved my issue to where I am satisfied, so I would definitely feel comfortable buying from them again, knowing they truly want their customers to be happy. I sincerely appreciate them and their customer service.
